data.name: Swords And Their Boy
data.detailed_description:
Can't wait? Check my last game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290170/Titan_Chaser/


About the Game

You play as a Broken One - a boy who should be dead, but two AI swords keep his bones and flesh alive.

Together swords and their boy must cleanse all the livable zones on alien planet from dangerous monsters and robots and keep it's safe for the first colonists to arrive.

Two swords - two types of damage at your disposal, you can alternate different strikes as you wish.

Different creatures can react to electric and physical damage differently, so you need to learn how to deal with every enemy effectively.

Swords can offer different perks and you can combine them to find your own playstyle.

data.short_description: Swords and Their Boy is a 2.5D sci-fi souls-like action about two AI swords using a mortally wounded boy to finish their task - cleanse an alien planet before its colonization.
